title: Speden Spelit – Arduino Reaction Game
description: An Arduino-based reaction game developed as a team project during the Application Project course at Oulu University of Applied Sciences. The project focuses on interrupt-driven programming, modular C++ design and hardware–software interaction using buttons, LEDs, displays, sound and EEPROM-based high score storage.
highlights: Implemented interrupt-driven button handling with software debouncing
Designed modular embedded software architecture (game logic, buttons, LEDs, display)
Developed EEPROM-based high score system and dynamic game speed control

title: FastAPI Project
description: A fast and scalable API built with FastAPI, integrated with PostgreSQL for data persistence and designed to manage tasks and users efficiently. The API supports authentication, user management and task handling features.
highlights: Fast and efficient RESTful API built with FastAPI
Database integration using PostgreSQL and SQLAlchemy
Comprehensive user authentication and management system

title: Business Analytics SQL Project
description: A portfolio-ready SQL analytics project that simulates a real-world sales database. The project demonstrates data modeling, advanced SQL querying and business insight generation using PostgreSQL. It answers key business questions around revenue growth, customer lifetime value and retention through cohort analysis.
highlights: Designed a relational data model optimized for analytical queries
Built advanced SQL analyses including cohort-based customer retention
Translated raw query results into actionable business insights

highlights: Designed and developed the entire website from start to finish
